item.title: 即时观点：投资者对中国大范围降息的反应
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜周二表示，中国央行将下调银行存款准备金率50个基点，并进一步降低主要利率，以支持物价回升。【原文：China's central bank will cut banks' reserve requirement ratio by 50 basis points and further reduce key interest rates to support a recovery in prices, its governor Pan Gongsheng said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Miniso 因计划收购永辉超市股份而股价下跌
item.description: 周二，美尼苏集团控股公司股价暴跌 39%，此前这家生活用品零售商表示，将以 63 亿元人民币（约合 8.9305 亿美元）的价格收购中国超市运营商永辉超市 29.4% 的股份。【原文：Shares of Miniso Group Holding plunged 39% on Tuesday after the lifestyle products retailer said it would take up a 29.4% stake in Chinese supermarket operator Yonghui Superstores for 6.3 billion yuan ($893.05 million).】

item.title: 中国央行表示将下调存款准备金率和利率
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜周二表示，中国央行将下调银行存款准备金率50个基点，并进一步降低主要利率，以支持物价回升。【原文：China's central bank will cut banks' reserve requirement ratio by 50 basis points and further reduce key interest rates to support a recovery in prices, its governor Pan Gongsheng said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行决议和上田讲话前亚洲股市持稳
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市创下两个多月来的最高点，原因是对美国进一步降息的预期使风险情绪高涨，同时投资者也在等待澳大利亚央行的政策决定。【原文：Asian stocks were perched at their highest in more than two months on Tuesday as expectations for more U.S. rate cuts kept risk sentiment aloft, while investors awaited a policy decision from Australia's central bank.】

item.title: 油价因担心中东冲突扩大和美国风暴而上涨
item.description: 由于担心以色列与真主党之间愈演愈烈的冲突可能会影响中东主要产油地区的供应，以及本周晚些时候一场热带风暴可能会影响全球最大原油生产国美国的产量，周二油价上涨。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday on concerns the intensifying conflict between Israel and Hezbollah may impact supply in the key Middle East producing region and a tropical storm may impact output in the U.S., the world's biggest crude producer, later this week.】

item.title: 澳元兑美元在澳大利亚央行决议前接近 2024 年高点；日元在等待上田的过程中漂移
item.description: 澳元周二徘徊在年内最高水平附近，央行稍后将维持政策稳定，交易商关注任何近期可能放松政策的暗示。【原文：The Australian dollar hovered close to its highest level of the year on Tuesday, with the central bank set to hold policy steady later and traders focussed on any hints of potential near-term easing.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本 9 月份工厂活动下滑
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于生产疲软，日本 9 月份的工厂活动有所放缓，尽管服务业的进一步扩张支撑了整体商业势头。【原文：Japan's factory activity eased in September due to softer production, although further expansion in the service sector supported overall business momentum, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新日铁的森要求美国工人联盟领导层 "坐到谈判桌前
item.description: 新日铁副董事长森隆弘（Takahiro Mori）周二表示，日本公司仍致力于与美国钢铁工人联合会（USW）就其收购美国钢铁公司的竞标进行谈判。【原文：Nippon Steel Vice Chairman Takahiro Mori said on Tuesday the Japanese company remains committed to talks with the United Steelworkers (USW) labour union over its bid to acquire U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 消息人士称，Spirit Aero 因记录异常而对部件进行的调查可追溯到 2010 年
item.description: 两位业内消息人士告诉路透社，美国供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 在发现文件丢失和重复的情况后，正在调查多年来多个飞机项目的零部件记录保存情况。【原文：U.S. supplier Spirit AeroSystems is investigating years of record-keeping of parts for multiple plane programs, after discovering cases of missing and duplicate paperwork, two industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Visa 面临美国司法部关于借记卡的反托拉斯案件
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部计划指控 Visa 非法垄断美国借记卡市场。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department plans to allege that Visa illegally monopolized the U.S. debit card market, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称，微软可能会在三里岛电力协议中支付 Constellation 溢价
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）分析师周一表示，作为与宾夕法尼亚州三里岛核电站有关的长期购电协议（PPA）的一部分，微软估计将向星座能源公司（Constellation Energy）支付溢价。【原文：Microsoft is estimated to pay Constellation Energy a premium as part of a long-term power purchase agreement (PPA) related to the Three Mile Island nuclear plant in Pennsylvania, Jefferies analysts said on Monday.】

item.title: 报告称，美国劳动力系统通过种族歧视限制机会
item.description: 政治与经济研究联合中心（Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies）的一份新报告发现，美国的公共劳动力系统可能正在使美国黑人就业中的种族不平等现象长期存在下去。【原文：A new report from the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies has found that the U.S. public workforce system may be perpetuating racial inequities in employment for Black Americans.】

item.title: 诺和称 Ozempic 将在不到一年的时间内获得美国价格谈判资格
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司首席执行官拉尔斯-弗鲁尔加德-约根森（Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen）在周一的书面证词中表示，根据目前的标准，诺和诺德公司的糖尿病特效药Ozempic将在不到一年的时间内获得美国政府的价格谈判资格。【原文：Novo Nordisk's blockbuster diabetes drug Ozempic will be eligible for U.S. government's price negotiations in less than a year based on current criteria, the Danish drugmaker's CEO Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen said in his written testimony on Monday.】

item.title: 法官结束决定默多克传媒帝国命运的听证会
item.description: 鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）全球电视和出版帝国控制权的听证会周一在内华达州里诺市一间法庭结束，但结果仍不明朗。【原文：A hearing to determine control of Rupert Murdoch’s global television and publishing empire concluded Monday in a Reno, Nevada, courtroom, though the outcome remained unclear.】

item.title: 亚洲政策聚焦澳大利亚央行、日本央行上田
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国联邦贸易委员会将为雪佛龙以 530 亿美元收购石油竞争对手赫斯的交易开绿灯
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，美国联邦贸易委员会预计最快将于本周为美国石油生产商雪佛龙收购赫斯公司的交易开绿灯，埃克森美孚对这项价值 530 亿美元的交易提出的质疑将成为最后的障碍。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is expected to greenlight U.S. oil producer Chevron's purchase of Hess as soon as this week, two people familiar with the matter said, leaving Exxon Mobil's challenge to the $53 billion deal as its final hurdle.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，Meta 的人工智能聊天机器人将开始使用朱迪-丹奇、约翰-塞纳等人的声音说话
item.description: 一位熟悉 Meta Platforms 公司计划的消息人士周一告诉路透社，该公司计划在本周宣布已与朱迪-丹奇（Judi Dench）、克里斯汀-贝尔（Kristen Bell）和约翰-塞纳（John Cena）等演员达成协议，让他们为其 Meta AI 聊天机器人配音。【原文：Facebook owner Meta Platforms is planning to announce this week that it has secured deals with actors including Judi Dench, Kristen Bell and John Cena to give voice to its Meta AI chatbot, a source familiar with the company's plans told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 加拿大省支持的矿商誓言在稀土领域与中国竞争
item.description: 加拿大萨斯喀彻温省誓言要在稀土加工和生产方面与中国一争高下，并成为北美首个稀土金属商业替代来源。【原文：The Canadian province of Saskatchewan has vowed to compete with China in processing and production of rare earths and become the first North American commercial alternative source for the metals, used to make magnets for electric vehicles and wind turbines.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会与 Coinbase 就加密货币规则制定问题对簿公堂
item.description: Coinbase 和美国证券监管机构周一在费城联邦上诉法院对峙，加密货币交易所要求该机构制定数字资产新规则。【原文：Coinbase and the U.S. securities regulator faced off in a federal appeals court in Philadelphia on Monday as the cryptocurrency exchange presses the agency to create new rules for digital assets.】

item.title: Stellantis 否认未履行对 UAW 的承诺
item.description: Stellantis 周一否认未能履行其与美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）在 2023 年达成的协议中的承诺，尽管该工会在全国性罢工一年后准备举行史无前例的罢工。【原文：Stellantis on Monday denied failing to honor its commitments with the United Auto Workers under an agreement reached in 2023, even as the union prepares for an unprecedented strike a year after a national walkout.】

item.title: Stellantis 开始寻找首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯的继任者
item.description: Stellantis 公司周一表示，已开始物色接替首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）的人选，后者的合同将于 2026 年到期。【原文：Stellantis said on Monday it has begun a search for a candidate to succeed CEO Carlos Tavares, whose contract is set to expire in 2026.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）誓言追究波音公司责任，改革机构安全计划
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长将于周二告诉国会，该局将对波音公司进行问责，以确保这家飞机制造商制造出安全的飞机，并将对其自身的安全管理计划进行改革。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration will tell Congress on Tuesday the agency will hold Boeing accountable to ensure the planemaker is building safe airplanes and will revamp its own safety management program.】

item.title: 波音公司提议为罢工工人加薪 30%，并称这是 "最终 "提议
item.description: 周一，波音公司向数千名罢工工人提出了更高的工资建议，提出在四年内将工资普遍提高 30%，波音公司称这是其在罢工持续期间提出的 "最好也是最后的 "建议。【原文：Boeing upped its wage proposal to thousands of striking workers on Monday, offering a 30% general wage increase over four years in what it called its "best and final" offer as the strike drags on.】

item.title: 内幕交易限制到期后，特朗普传媒股价跌至新低
item.description: 周一，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司股价暴跌超过 5%，创下新低，在内幕抛售限制到期后扩大了近期的跌幅。【原文：Shares of former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company tumbled over 5% to a new low on Monday, extending recent losses after restrictions on insider selling expired.】

item.title: 飓风风险增加，能源公司撤离美国墨西哥湾非必要人员
item.description: 据预测，风暴将在本周中期变成飓风，在此之前，美国近海石油生产商正在采取初步措施，从墨西哥湾生产平台撤离非必要人员。【原文：U.S. offshore oil producers were taking initial steps ahead of a storm predicted to become a hurricane in the middle of the week, evacuating non-essential staff from Gulf of Mexico production platforms.】

item.title: 企业要求世界各国领导人在联合国落实可再生能源目标
item.description: 几家大公司的高管周一敦促世界各国领导人落实去年在迪拜举行的 COP28 峰会上达成的国际协议，即到 2030 年将可再生能源发电能力提高两倍，以应对气候变化。【原文：Executives from several major companies urged world leaders on Monday to follow through on an international agreement, made at the COP28 summit in Dubai last year, to triple renewable-energy capacity by 2030 to fight climate change.】

item.title: Blackrock 获意大利批准持有莱昂纳多超过 3% 的股份
item.description: 周一的一份政府文件显示，全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）已获得意大利政府批准，持有国防和航空航天集团莱昂纳多（Leonardo）3%以上的股份。【原文：BlackRock , the world's biggest asset manager, has secured Italian government approval to hold a stake of more than 3% in defence and aerospace group Leonardo , a government document showed on Monday.】

item.title: 在可能发生港口罢工之际，美国劳工部与雇主团体进行接触
item.description: 美国劳工部周一表示，在国际码头工人协会（International Longshoremen's Association）可能在东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸举行港口罢工之前，已与美国海事联盟（United States Maritime Alliance）进行了接触。【原文：The U.S. Department of Labor has reached out to the United States Maritime Alliance ahead of a possible ports strike on the East Coast and Gulf Coast by the International Longshoremen's Association, the employer group said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国诉讼称丰田叉车发动机排放作弊
item.description: 丰田公司在美国被提起集体诉讼，指控这家日本汽车制造商的九款叉车发动机存在排放作弊行为。【原文：Toyota has been sued in a proposed U.S. class action accusing the Japanese automaker of emissions cheating in nine engines for its forklift trucks.】

item.title: 美联储文件勾勒出央行抵押贷款债券的缓慢卸载过程
item.description: 根据美国中央银行的最新研究，几乎所有可能的美国利率走势都将使美联储在十年后持有多达 6,000 亿美元的抵押贷款债券，这可能会支持美联储直接出售这些证券，以实现债券组合主要由国债组成的目标。【原文：Almost any likely path for U.S. interest rates will leave the Federal Reserve owning as much as $600 billion in mortgage bonds a decade from now, according to new U.S. central bank research that could bolster a case for selling the securities outright to meet a goal of a bond portfolio composed mostly of Treasuries.】
